document.full_text: a newly constituted company led by united states businessman thomas di benedetto said on friday that it has sealed a deal to buy control of italian soccer club as roma, subject to regulatory approval.
document.title: u.s.-led consortium seals deal to buy as roma
lines_and_colors: a newly constituted company led by united states businessman thomas di benedetto said on friday that it has sealed a deal to buy control of italian soccer club as roma, subject to regulatory approval.
